Rule.name: Initiator and Responder must be dating to sabatoge the relationship
I has the hots for R

InfluenceRule.name: If the responder has been doing both mean things and romantic things to the initiator
i is self-destructive
Impulsive people are much more likely to date their enemy
People who are afraid of commitment are especially unlikely to date an enemy
People who take things slowly are especially unlikely to date an enemy
You need to be very confident in order to want to date your enemy
Hotheaded people are likely to date enemies
You are a pacifist so you don't like fighting, but you will still only start dating them if you have high romance for them
If I feel embarrassed, I'm not going to go out there and do something as carazy as date my enemy
Initiator is desperate and really likes their enemy a whole lot
If I is angry at the initiator, however, then two angry people are not that attractive
The idea that if you are ever in a position to trust your enemy, there is a chance that you then might start dating them
If the initiator happens to like a lot of badass things, then they are more likely to initiate this potentially badass maneuver themselves
If you crush on your enemy, likely
If you have high romance for your enemy, likely
basic boost to compensate for other romance games have higher cume weights
Responder is impulsive and will say sure why not
*** Responder is a smooth talker and responds glibly
Responder is afraid of commitment, and this is even more pressing when dealing with enemies
Responder takes things slowly, and this is even more pressing when dealing with enemies
as a responder, i've been doing badass things to you!

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% asked out %r% even though %prons(i,he/she)% totally hated %pron(r,him/her)%
%i% had that embarrassing love/hate thing going with %r%
%i% tried to get back together with %r%
%i% tried to tell %r% %prons(r,he/she)%'s hot when %prons(r,he/she)%'s angry, but it backfired
%i% started dating %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% had been enemies
%i% tried to take advantage of %r% when %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% heartbroken
%i% got really turned on when %r% %pron(r,was/were)% mean to %pron(i,him/her)% and so %list(i,r,we/they)% started dating
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% so cool even %pron(i,his/her)% enemies wanted to date %pron(i,him/her)%
%i% took advantage of %r% being upset at %o%
%r% struck back at %i% for turning out to be %pron(r,his/her)% secret %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%. You are without a doubt the worst person in the world.
Whenever I see you, my blood boils. Hate fills my brain. My heart turns black, withers, and dies.
So, do you wanna go out?
%r%. You are without a doubt the worst person in the world.
Whenever I see you, my blood boils. Hate fills my brain. My heart turns black, wither, and dies.
So, do you wanna go out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %rand(No,Go to Hell,I'd sooner date a wookie,You're pathetic,You've got to be kidding me,Get a life)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, %r%. I don't know why you have to be such a %pejorative% all the time. Remember when we used to date?
... that was awesome.
So... do you wanna...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh. Ooohhhhh... yeah, okay. Let's do it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ... awesome.
Look, %r%. I don't know why you have to be such a %pejorative% all the time. Remember when we used to date?
... that was awesome.
So... you don't wanna...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I have no idea what you're talking about...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, look, it's everybody's favorite %pejorative%. %rand(I thought I smelled you coming.,Still wearing the same stupid outfit?,Shouldn't you be in quarantine?,It's my lucky day.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, I've been thinking. I heard about that time when %toc1%. I think maybe I misjudged you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, uh, how so?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're actually %rand(way more stupid than I thought.,a complete idiot.,dumber than dumb. You're like a whole new kind of dumb that science has yet to fully understand.,more annoying than mean. It's just too bad that doesn't make you any more likeable.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're so hot when you insult back. Let's go out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you kidding me? %rand(I'd rather make out with a cheese grater.,Get outta my face.,If you honestly thought that was going to work... congratulations, you're completely delusional!)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, look, it's everybody's favorite %pejorative%. %rand(I thought I smelled you coming.,Still wearing the same stupid outfit?,Shouldn't you be in quarantine?,It's my lucky day.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, I've been thinking. I heard about that time when %toc1%. I think maybe I misjudged you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, uh, how so?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're actually a pretty nice %gender(i,dude,girl)%. %rand(You're just too dumb to act like it.,When your dumb doesn't screw you up, anyway. You're just mean to compensate for your tiny brain.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're so hot when you insult back. Let's go out.
Hey, I know we've always been fighting, but there's something about the way you snarl... it really gets me goin'.
Ooh... yeah... like that. Like that.
Yeah. We should go out.
Hey, word on the street is you've been feeling a little down.
Ooh, I love that fire in your eyes.
Give me a chance, %r%. Let me fix that broken heart of yours. Let's go out, you big, loveable, %rand(porcupine,prickly pear,cuddly cactus)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't believe this. And yet, it's strangely compelling....
Fine. I'll go out with you.
Just never use that pet name on me again.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever you say %sweetie%.
Feeling down, my arch-nemesis?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why don't you step on a crack and die?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mmmmmm.... you know, you've always had a way with words. It kinda.... makes me feel good.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, I hope you're used to it because that's the only way I will ever treat you. Beat it, trash. I'm not in the mood.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm serious here. We should go out. Crazier things have...
%r%, I know we haven't been on the best of terms, but I can't stop thinking about when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You say that like you enjoyed it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oooo... well not exactly... but you're pretty hot when you're angry.
I love it when you treat me bad baby. Let's go out.
Crazier things have happened. Just go with the flow %sweetie%.
If it isn't my 'favorite' person, %r%.
I love it when you talk dirty to me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's because that's the only way to speak to a dog.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm a dog because I would follow you everywhere you go. Woof.
I'd rather kiss you.
We could be one hot couple, %sweetie%. Let's go out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, I have to admit this isn't where I thought this conversation was going, but you are one cool %gender(r,cat,kitten)%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Looking good %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: They have a special place in the fiery void for people like you. It's right there with people who cheat on tests.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oooooo, sounds hot %r%, but I've never cheated on a test before.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, but you've cheated on other people, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, let me explain.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, you just keep on burning.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, there is a secret that I.... I must tell you.
Remember in junior high, that masked %gender(i,boy,girl)% from another school you met in secret? Your first crush?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I remember. %o% always told me you knew who %pron(i,he/she)% was.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %o% never told you what happened to your secret %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend.
No.
*I* am your secret %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend.
Search your feelings, you know it to be true.
Join me, %r%, and together we can rule our senior prom as Prom %gender(r,King,Queen)% and... uh... secret %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend.
...so, you won't go out with me then?
